text: Leicestershire shown within England There are over 9,000 Grade I listed buildings in England. This page is a list of these buildings in the county of Leicestershire, by district. ==Blaby== |} ==Charnwood== |} ==City of Leicester== |} ==Harborough== |} ==Hinckley and Bosworth== |} ==Melton== |} ==North West Leicestershire== |} ==Oadby and Wigston== |} ==See also== * Grade II* listed buildings in Leicestershire ==References == National Heritage List for England ==Notes== ==External links== listed buildings
title: Grade I listed buildings in Leicestershire
